PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02442012-03-01,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActJudges Act
SubjectCarol Anne Thomson ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Gordon Ian Thomson
PrecisGranting of an annuity to CAROL ANNE THOMSON, widow of the Hon. Gordon Ian Thomson, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective December 23, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Carol Anne Thomson ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY **  The Hon. Gordon Ian Thomson
precis: Granting of an annuity to CAROL ANNE THOMSON, widow of the Hon. Gordon Ian Thomson, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective December 23, 2011.
